## IndexedPredicate type

A function that receives an object (`elem`<!-- -->) and its `index` in the iteration and returns a `boolean` value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type IndexedPredicate<T> = (elem: T, index: number) => boolean;
```
